Row.Text: Evidence has come to light that the Second civil war was orchestrated by our trecherous King. A peace settlement is going nowhere and the army demands justice! We have no choice but to charge him with treason!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free Social Policy[ENDCOLOR]
The King is dead! Long live the Republic!
The King of England has been executed by his Parliament. It is now a commonwealth

We have recieved news that a Quaker has re-enacted the arrival of Christ in Jerusalem . . . By riding into Bristol on a donkey. Fear not, for we have already put him into a pillory, pierced his tongue with a hot iron, whipped him, well, you get the idea.
This is terrible, he is but a harmless fool, we must have religious tolerance, whether Parliament wants it or not!
And rightfully so, we must not have blasphemers undermine our Godly nation!

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {2_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]A free Great Prophet appears[ENDCOLOR]
Parliament is in chaos over the allowance of greater religious tolerance, but radical sects seem to be thriving!
The gentry and Parliament are happy with the clamping down of radical sects, it has given the nation much greater religious uniformity
England is in uproar over a man who re-enacted the arrival of Christ in Jerusalem.
